headline: Pacific Life Foundation Donates $250,000 to the American Red Cross for Victims of the California Wildfires
cutline: NEWPORT BEACH, CA – The Pacific Life Foundation announced today a $250,000 donation to the American Red Cross in support of relief efforts for those impacted by the California wildfires. The Foundation also announced plans to match employee donations.
lede: NEWPORT BEACH, CA – The Pacific Life Foundation announced today a $250,000 donation to the American Red Cross in support of relief efforts for those impacted by the California wildfires. The Foundation also announced plans to match employee donations.
